about_the_game:
Game Introduction:
Plot and Story Background:
The game is set in a fictional world of immortals and martial arts, where the universe is filled with demons, spirits, humans, and mystical creatures. Players delve into a complex world woven from ancient legends and modern destinies, where every step influences the fate of the entire realm. Amidst this chaos, players not only face formidable foes from the heavens but also unravel the internal strife and secrets of the mixed Yuan world.

Strategy Gameplay:
The game emphasizes deep, chess-like strategic gameplay. Players must skillfully deploy troops and utilize the terrain and unique abilities of each character to devise tactics. Additionally, certain special instances and challenging battles incorporate appropriate Roguelike elements, enhancing the game's challenge and replay value.

Team Building (BD):
Focused on squad-based strategy, the game encourages creating distinct battle experiences through character talents, talisman mechanics, team combinations, and random battlefield conditions. How to overcome challenges and construct the BD is up to the player—there are no standard answers, only better ones. We design the mechanics, and the players create unexpected outcomes.

Alchemy System:
Beyond rich combat and exploration, we've integrated a crucial Alchemy system. "Tianlin Hunyuan" emphasizes the fun and randomness of the Alchemy system, recalling the joy of the Alchemy Pot in "Xuanyuan Sword" from our childhood. We hope to let players experience the joy of creation and transformation through this system. Players can collect various materials and recipes, using alchemy to create powerful talismans, medicines, and spells, with each attempt potentially yielding surprising and novel results.

Open World:
As a strategy chess game, we've decided to develop world exploration. Once the main storyline unlocks the world map, players can freely explore the vast world, uncover side stories, marvel at the wonders of the mixed Yuan world, and complete various challenges. Soar with the Kun Peng, and discover the world's secrets.

The demo version mainly includes team combinations and battle experiences. The growth system and more gameplay systems will be continuously updated in future demo versions.

short_description: "Tianlin Hunyuan" is a Chinese-style Xianxia SRPG with chess strategy and Roguelike elements, set in an open world. Players uncover lies and pursue freedom in a complex world of deep emotions and power struggles, embarking on an epic strategic and emotional adventure.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
